setup_treearrays.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 subroutine pepc_setup(my_rank,n_cpu,npart_total,theta,db_level,np_mult,fetch_mult)
00002   use treevars
00003   implicit none
00004   include 'mpif.h'
00005 
00006   real, intent(in) :: theta     ! Multipole clumping parameter
00007   integer, intent(in) :: my_rank  ! MPI cpu rank
00008   integer, intent(in) :: n_cpu  ! MPI # CPUs
00009   integer, intent(in) :: npart_total  ! total (max) # simulation particles
00010   integer, intent(in) :: db_level
00011   real, intent(in) :: np_mult ! particle array size multiplication factor (1.5)
00012   integer, intent(in) :: fetch_mult ! fetch array size multiplication factor (10)
00013 
00014   integer :: ibig, machinebits,k
00015   integer :: ierr,npsize
00016   integer :: mem_parts, mem_multipoles, mem_fields, mem_tree, mem_prefetch, mem_tot, mem_lists
00017   character(3) :: cme
00018   character(30) :: cfile
00019   real, parameter :: mb=2.**20
00020 
00021 ! copy call parameters to treevars module
00022 
00023   me = my_rank
00024   num_pe = n_cpu
00025   npart = npart_total
00026   ipefile = 20
00027 
00028   if (db_level==1) then
00029 !      domain_debug = .true.
00030         
00031   else if (db_level==2) then
00032       tree_debug=.true.
00033       force_debug=.false.
00034       walk_summary=.true.
00035       prefetch_debug=.false. 
00036       domain_debug = .true.
00037 
00038   else if (db_level==3) then
00039      tree_debug=.true.
00040      domain_debug = .true.
00041      build_debug=.true.
00042      branch_debug=.true.
00043      prefetch_debug=.true.
00044      walk_debug=.true.
00045      walk_summary=.true.
00046      force_debug=.true.
00047 
00048   else if (db_level==4) then
00049      dump_tree=.true.
00050 
00051   else if (db_level==5) then
00052      tree_debug=.true.
00053      domain_debug = .true.
00054      build_debug=.true.
00055      branch_debug=.true.
00056      prefetch_debug=.true.
00057      walk_debug=.true.
00058      walk_summary=.true.
00059      force_debug=.true.
00060      dump_tree=.true.
00061   else
00062 ! all off by default
00063 
00064   endif
00065 
00066   npartm = npart
00067   if (np_mult>0) then 
00068     nppm = abs(np_mult)*2*max(npartm/num_pe,1000) ! allow 50% fluctuation
00069   else
00070     nppm = 5*max(npartm/num_pe,1000) ! allow 50% fluctuation
00071   endif
00072   
00073   nshortm = 1000    ! Max shortlist length: leave safety factor for nshort_list in FORCES
00074 
00075   ! Estimate of interaction list length - Hernquist expression
00076   if (theta >0 ) then
00077      nintmax = max(1.*24*log(2.*npartm)/theta**2,2200.)
00078   else
00079      nintmax = npartm
00080   endif
00081   max_list_length = 0 ! current max length of all interaction lists
00082 
00083   ! tree stuff
00084 
00085   nlev = 20                     ! max refinement level
00086   iplace = 2_8**(3*nlev)           ! place holder bit
00087 
00088   !  Space for # table and tree arrays
00089   !  TODO: need good estimate for max # branches
00090    npsize=nppm
00091    size_tree = max(4*nintmax+npsize,10000)
00092    if (np_mult>0) then
00093      nbaddr = max(log(1.*size_tree)/log(2.) + 1,15.)
00094      maxaddress = 2**nbaddr
00095    else
00096      nbaddr = 17   ! fixed address range
00097      maxaddress = abs(np_mult)*10000
00098    endif
00099    size_fetch = fetch_mult*size_tree/4
00100    nbranch_max = maxaddress/2
00101 !   nbranch_max = 4*nintmax*max(1.,log(1.*num_pe))
00102    if (num_pe==1) size_fetch=size_tree
00103 !  maxaddress = 512
00104    hashconst = 2**nbaddr-1
00105   free_lo = 1024      ! lowest free address for collision resolution (from 4th level up)
00106   if (me==0 .and. db_level>0) then
00107     write(*,*) 'size_tree= ',size_tree
00108     write(*,*) 'max address = ',maxaddress
00109     write(*,*) 'max branches = ',nbranch_max
00110     write(*,*) 'size_fetch= ',size_fetch
00111     write(*,*) 'np_mult= ',np_mult
00112     write(*,*) 'fetch_mult= ',fetch_mult
00113   endif 
00114 
00115   work_local = 1 ! Initial value for local load
00116 
00117 ! Memory estimate
00118   mem_parts = nppm*(22*8 + 2*4 + 8)
00119   mem_lists = nshortm + nshortm*nintmax*(8+4)
00120   mem_tree =  maxaddress * (36 + 4 + 4 + 4) & ! # htable stuff
00121                       + num_pe * (4+4+4+4)  & ! request stuff
00122                       + maxaddress * (3*8) & ! keys
00123                       + size_fetch * 2*(22*8+2*4) & ! get_child, pack_child buffers
00124                       + nbranch_max * (8 + 4 + 8 + 8*23)  ! branches
00125   mem_multipoles = maxaddress * (8+3*4 + 23*8 + 8) 
00126   mem_prefetch = size_fetch*(8 + 4) + num_pe*4 *11 + maxaddress*8*2*2
00127   mem_tot = mem_parts+mem_tree+mem_prefetch+mem_multipoles+mem_lists
00128 
00129   if (me==0 .and. db_level>0) then
00130      write(*,'(//a/)') 'Initial memory allocation:'
00131      write(*,'(6(a15,f14.3,a3/)/)') 'Particles: ',mem_parts/mb,' MB', &
00132                                'Tree:',mem_tree/mb,' MB', &
00133                                'Lists:',mem_lists/mb,' MB', &
00134                                'Prefetch:',mem_prefetch/mb,' MB', &
00135                                'Multipoles:',mem_multipoles/mb,' MB', &
00136                                'TOTAL: ',mem_tot/mb,' MB'
00137      write(*,'(a)') 'Allocating particle and tree arrays ...'
00138   endif
00139 
00140   ! array allocation
00141 
00142   allocate ( x(nppm), y(nppm), z(nppm), ux(nppm), uy(nppm), uz(nppm), & 
00143        q(nppm), m(nppm), work(nppm), &
00144        Ex(nppm), Ey(nppm), Ez(nppm), pot(nppm), &
00145        Ax(nppm), Ay(nppm), Az(nppm), &
00146        Bx(nppm), By(nppm), Bz(nppm),  &
00147        Axo(nppm), Ayo(nppm), Azo(nppm), &
00148        pepid(nppm), pelabel(nppm), pekey(nppm) )    ! Reserve particle array space N/NPE
00149 
00150 
00151 
00152   allocate ( nterm(nshortm), intlist(nintmax,nshortm), nodelist(nintmax,nshortm) )! interaction key-, node-lists
00153 
00154   allocate ( htable(0:maxaddress), all_addr(0:maxaddress), free_addr(maxaddress), point_free(0:maxaddress), &
00155        nbranches(num_pe+2), igap(num_pe+3), &
00156        treekey(maxaddress), branch_key(nbranch_max), branch_owner(nbranch_max), &
00157        pebranch(nbranch_max), leaf_key(maxaddress), twig_key(maxaddress), &
00158        fetched_owner(size_fetch), fetched_keys(size_fetch), requested_owner(size_fetch), requested_keys(size_fetch), &
00159        nreqs_total(0:num_pe-1), nfetch_total(0:num_pe-1) )
00160 
00161 
00162 
00163   all_addr = (/ (k,k=0,maxaddress) /)      ! List of all possible # table addresses
00164   htable%node = 0
00165   htable%key = 0
00166   htable%link = -1
00167   htable%leaves = 0
00168   htable%childcode = 0
00169 
00170   ! Allocate memory for tree node properties
00171 
00172   maxleaf = maxaddress/3
00173   maxtwig = 2*maxleaf
00174 
00175   nreqs_total(0:num_pe-1) = 0   ! Zero cumulative fetch/ship counters for non-local nodes
00176   nfetch_total(0:num_pe-1) = 0  
00177 
00178   allocate ( first_child(-maxtwig:maxleaf), n_children(-maxtwig:maxleaf), node_level(-maxtwig:maxleaf) )
00179 
00180   allocate ( charge(-maxtwig:maxleaf), &                    ! charge
00181        abs_charge(-maxtwig:maxleaf), &                ! absolute charge
00182        xcoc(-maxtwig:maxleaf), ycoc(-maxtwig:maxleaf), zcoc(-maxtwig:maxleaf), &    ! centre of charge 
00183        xshift(-maxtwig:maxleaf), yshift(-maxtwig:maxleaf), zshift(-maxtwig:maxleaf), &    ! shift vector
00184        xdip(-maxtwig:maxleaf), ydip(-maxtwig:maxleaf), zdip(-maxtwig:maxleaf), &          ! dipole moment
00185        xxquad(-maxtwig:maxleaf), yyquad(-maxtwig:maxleaf), zzquad(-maxtwig:maxleaf), &       ! quadrupole moment
00186        xyquad(-maxtwig:maxleaf), yzquad(-maxtwig:maxleaf), zxquad(-maxtwig:maxleaf), &
00187        jx(-maxtwig:maxleaf), jy(-maxtwig:maxleaf), jz(-maxtwig:maxleaf), &      ! current
00188        magmx(-maxtwig:maxleaf), magmy(-maxtwig:maxleaf), magmz(-maxtwig:maxleaf) ) ! magnetic moment 
00189 
00190   allocate ( pack_child(size_fetch),get_child(size_fetch) )    ! Multipole shipping buffers
00191 
00192  
00193 
00194 ! work balance arrays
00195   allocate  (work_loads(num_pe),npps(num_pe),pivots(num_pe+1))  ! Work load & Particle distrib amoung PEs
00196 
00197 
00198   ! Create new contiguous datatype for shipping particle properties (15 arrays)
00199 
00200   blocklengths(1:nprops_particle) = 1   
00201 
00202 
00203   types(1:12) = MPI_REAL8
00204   types(13) = MPI_INTEGER8
00205   types(14:15) = MPI_INTEGER
00206 
00207   call MPI_ADDRESS( get_props%x, receive_base, ierr )  ! Base address for receive buffer
00208   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%x, send_base, ierr )  ! Base address for send buffer
00209 
00210 
00211 
00212   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%x, address(1), ierr )
00213   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%y, address(2), ierr )
00214   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%z, address(3), ierr )
00215   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%ux, address(4), ierr )
00216   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%uy, address(5), ierr )
00217   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%uz, address(6), ierr )
00218   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%q, address(7), ierr )
00219   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%m, address(8), ierr )
00220   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%work, address(9), ierr )
00221   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%ax, address(10), ierr )
00222   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%ay, address(11), ierr )
00223   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%az, address(12), ierr )
00224   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%key, address(13), ierr )
00225   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%label, address(14), ierr )
00226   call MPI_ADDRESS( ship_props%pid, address(15), ierr )
00227 
00228   displacements(1:nprops_particle) = address(1:nprops_particle) - send_base  !  Addresses relative to start of particle (receive) data
00229 
00230   call MPI_TYPE_STRUCT( nprops_particle, blocklengths, displacements, types, mpi_type_particle, ierr )   ! Create and commit
00231   call MPI_TYPE_COMMIT( mpi_type_particle, ierr)
00232 
00233   ! Create new contiguous datatype for shipping multipole properties (25 arrays)
00234 
00235   blocklengths(1:nprops_multipole) = 1   
00236 
00237 
00238   types(1) = MPI_INTEGER8
00239   types(2:4) = MPI_INTEGER
00240   types(5) = MPI_INTEGER8
00241   types(6:25) = MPI_REAL8
00242 
00243   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%key, send_base, ierr )  ! Base address for send buffer
00244 
00245 
00246 
00247   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%key, address(1), ierr )
00248   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%byte, address(2), ierr )
00249   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%leaves, address(3), ierr )
00250   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%owner, address(4), ierr )
00251   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%next, address(5), ierr )
00252   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%q, address(6), ierr )
00253   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%absq, address(7), ierr )
00254   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%xcoc, address(8), ierr )
00255   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%ycoc, address(9), ierr )
00256   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%zcoc, address(10), ierr )
00257   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%xdip, address(11), ierr )
00258   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%ydip, address(12), ierr )
00259   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%zdip, address(13), ierr )
00260   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%xxquad, address(14), ierr )
00261   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%yyquad, address(15), ierr )
00262   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%zzquad, address(16), ierr )
00263   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%xyquad, address(17), ierr )
00264   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%yzquad, address(18), ierr )
00265   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%zxquad, address(19), ierr )
00266   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%jx, address(20), ierr )
00267   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%jy, address(21), ierr )
00268   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%jz, address(22), ierr )
00269   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%magmx, address(23), ierr )
00270   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%magmy, address(24), ierr )
00271   call MPI_ADDRESS( node_dummy%magmz, address(25), ierr )
00272 
00273   displacements(1:nprops_multipole) = address(1:nprops_multipole) - send_base   !  Addresses relative to start of particle (receive) data
00274 
00275   call MPI_TYPE_STRUCT( nprops_multipole, blocklengths, displacements, types, mpi_type_multipole, ierr )   ! Create and commit
00276   call MPI_TYPE_COMMIT( mpi_type_multipole, ierr)
00277 
00278   if (me==0 .and. db_level>0) write(*,*) '... done'
00279   max_prefetches = 0
00280 
00281 end subroutine pepc_setup
